data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Step one: To begin with, it is easier to begin indoors. A ____ is ____. Show Fido the ____ ( ____ toy ) and ____ walking. Fido ____ be ____, ____ will ____ start ____ you. At this stage it does not matter where he is in relation to you, just click and reward.

data.fullContent: Step one: To begin with, it is easier to begin indoors. A passageway is great. Show Fido the treats ( or toy ) and start walking. Fido should be interested, and will probably start following you. At this stage it does not matter where he is in relation to you, just click and reward.
data.answer: 第一步：首先，在室内开始比较容易。通道很棒。向Fido展示零食（或玩具），然后开始走路。 Fido应该会感兴趣，并且可能会开始关注您。在此阶段，他与你的关系并不重要，只需单击并奖励即可。
